page.title: 15FARR SCHOOL
page.content: Farr school is the only school in our area.Between ten and twenty pupils attend our school at the moment but there has been as many as seventy since it was built in 1877.Subjects studied are Maths,English,Geography, Nature,History,Art,Gym,Music,Science, R.E and craft. The people from our school live in our area and three kilometres north and two kilometres south of our area.All those except the people next door get transport to school in the winter but in the summer they have to cycle or walk. School is in at 9:30, there is a playtime at 11:00.We start our lunch break at 12:45 and return at 2:00. School is out at 4:00.In the winter school is out at 3:30 and we have a shorter lunch break to allow children to get home before it is dark.
